ui::​Dialog

a dialog is used for display a centered frame on the screen the normal way to use a dialog is to instantiate it, then set its title and content widget values

there are two defaut dialog types that supply buttons:

  • InfoDialog supplies an "OK" button only

  • ConfirmationDialog supplies an "OK" and "CANCEL" button

when these buttons are clicked, the on_button_selected callback is called

Functions
on_button_selected
virtual void on_button_selected(
string s
):

this is called when the dialog's buttons are pressed
